raising it to critical.

You get this exception everytime that you do a build. 

Also, I had a deadlock when the project was building and the indexer was 
running (the indexer seamed to be hung)
This happens on any managed project build!

I am not using the indexer during the build. If it is running, maybe it thinks 
it has to index the build directory. Does the project get created after the NPE?

Committed a change in the makefile generator to return null when a new project 
is created and autobuild is on instead of trying to get the name of the 
unititialized build directory.
